    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    BoardVisualizer
     
    CanvasBombRenderer
    Renders a cartoon-style bomb graphic for hit markers.
    CanvasShipRenderer
    This class belongs to the view because it handles pixels and renders ships in two ways, the first (the way we did it, the simplest way) and the second, a way supported by AI assistance.
    CanvasSmokeRenderer
    Renders smoke and fire effects for damaged ship cells.
    Cell
    Represents a single cell on the game board.
    CellState
    List the possible states of a cell on the board.
    FileCRUD
    Provides basic CRUD (Create-Read-Update-Delete) operations for text files.
    GameController
    Main Controller for the Battleship Game.
    GameFileManager
    Manages game data persistence through both binary serialization and text logging.
    GameState
    Container class that holds the complete game state for saving and loading.
    InvalidMoveException
    Exception thrown when a player attempts to make a prohibited move.
    Launcher
     
    Main
     
    Serializer
    Utility class for object serialization and deserialization.
    Ship
    Represents a ship in the game with its size, name, and damage state.
    ShipFactory
    Factory Method
    ShipPlacementManager
    Configure the event handlers (DragOver, DragDropped, DragExited) in the dashboard panel to enable drop-in/drop-out.
    ShipRenderer
    Interface (Contract).
    WelcomeController
    Welcome View Controller.
